snippet: Shares in the mobile payment services company Square rose more than 7 percent on Friday after Visa disclosed the details of its ownership stake in the company.
abstract: Shares of mobile payment services firm Square rise more than 7 percent after Visa unveils details of its ownership stake in company.
lead_paragraph: Shares in the mobile payment services company Square rose more than 7 percent on Friday after Visa disclosed the details of its ownership stake in the company.

headline.main: Square Shares Rise as Investors Learn of Visa’s Stake
headline.print_headline: Square Shares Rise as Investors Learn of Visa’s Stake
